name: First-Aid Kit-Ten
description:
The 'Tower of Health' has been attacked by an army of Virus! Meowzy will go to each floor and he will find a puzzle  to solve to reach the next level. Reach the top of the Tower, beat the Virus and save your girlfriend?! (she was kidnapped I guess)

-Controls- 

Move - Keys

Jump - X

Interact/Shoot - Z

Enter Doors /Portals- Up Key

- Credits -

Game Made By HenryBitz

Special Thanks to Danikaze
